plot: The Force Is with Them: The Legacy of Star Wars is a Video Documentary included in the 2004 DVD of the Star Wars Original Trilogy. It explained the impact of "Star Wars" on various directors and actors.
title: The Force Is with Them: The Legacy of 'Star Wars'
plot_es: The Force Is with Them: The Legacy of Star Wars is a Video Documentary included in the 2004 DVD of the Star Wars Original Trilogy. It explained the impact of "Star Wars" on various directors and actors.
original_name: The Force Is with Them: The Legacy of 'Star Wars'
plot_en: The Force Is with Them: The Legacy of Star Wars is a Video Documentary included in the 2004 DVD of the Star Wars Original Trilogy. It explained the impact of "Star Wars" on various directors and actors.

cast.role: Himself - Director, 'The Lord of the Rings' Trilogy
cast.name: Peter Jackson
